file_content.text: You should get going, sir.
Beginning strategic synthesis. I am Grand Moff Kilran.
I confront the problem of a Republic fleet at Concord Dawn.
I respond sardonically as I consider the unique resources at our disposal. Access bounty hunter file.
Exciting times, sir. You should meet the new, genetically improved Watchers.
I'm not sure I understand what they're up to.
What are they doing?
Let's see the new crew.
Introduce me.
Watcher Seven?
You sound uncomfortable. Worried about being replaced?
You don't like them?
It's not that. But it's hard enough talking to Keeper.
They're practicing "cognitive symmetry" right now. They try to think like our greatest leaders... oh.
Cipher Nine. I am Watcher Seven. My siblings and I studied your work in training.
Tell me what your "studies" showed.
What did you think of me?
Despite your successes, you have repeatedly acted inefficiently. Given your recent undercover operation, we wonder about the stability of your psyche.
Your ruthlessness has not, overall, inhibited your effectiveness. Still, such habits can render a mind fragile.
You have been a particularly effective operative. Should you continue in this way, your eventual death will be a sad loss.
I understand you all come out of the eugenics program.
You're enhanced like Keeper?
Next generation thinking, proven training. We are the Empire's devoted servants.
This mission will require your complete attention. Fail me and you fail the Empire.
I expect your dedication.
We understand, Hand of Jadus.
Despite your successes, you do not represent the Empire. Your puzzling habits put you at a disadvantage.
That's enough. Return to your post.
We are aware of your willingness to punish the unfit. We do not intend to displease.
We know our duty, sir. We will support you.
They mean well, I think. Anyway, Keeper's briefing me on your operation in an hour... which means we both have work. Good luck.
The Supreme Chancellor is making a broadcast. I want everyone on analysis.
We'll talk later, sir.
General Rakton and Darth Baras request additional agents.
Relay to station seven. Updating tactical projections.
I have three Fixers who need extraction from Nevoota. Listening posts are done, but....
Sir. Go on ahead. I'll have the Minders debrief your team while you wait for Keeper.
It looks like you're in crisis mode. What's going on?
Things are busy in here.
It's been like this since the fighting intensified. We've rushed training, gone to sixteen-hour shifts....
You're practically running this place.
Glad to see you're doing well.
It feels that way, some days. I'm senior Watcher on permanent assignment to base.
Sir? Operation Kingstalker needs you.
I have to go. I'm sure we'll talk more.
Why wasn't she alerted when I landed?
I don't like having to wait.
She was, sir. Respectfully, headquarters doesn't revolve around your every movement. If you'll excuse me.
A bit busy right now, sir.
